author: Special Correspondent
text:
RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple: Kaala Bhairavar puja, Railway Colony, 5 p.m.

Panniru Tirumurai Mandram: Pannisai, Adi Streets, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 7 a.m.; discourse on ‘Periapuranam’ by N. S. Sundararaman, 26 Pandian Street, Sundar Nagar, Tirunagar, 5 p.m.

Tiruvalluvar Kazhagam: Discourse on ‘Meikandar’s Sivagnanabotham’ by A. Arumugam, North Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 7 p.m.

Ramakrishna Mutt: Discourse on ‘Aanmeega Vazhkkai’ by Swami Rajeshananda, 5.45 p.m.; aarathi, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

Gita Bhavanam: Discourse on ‘Bhagavad Gita’ by Swami Sivayogananda, 3 American Mission Lane, Kamarajar Salai, 6.45 p.m.

Arsha Parampara: Discourse on ‘Lalithasahasranamam’ and spiritual heritage class by Swamini Vidyananda Saraswathi, Old Kalyana Mandapam, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 10 a.m.; on ‘Mundakopanishad,’ 7 a.m.; ‘Bhaja Govindanm,’ Vasudhara, Andalpuram, 6.30 p.m.

Bharathi Yuva Kendra Trust: Discourse on ‘Villi Bharatham’ by Tiruchi Kalyanaraman, Setupati Higher Secondary School, North Veli Street, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Aurobindo Study Forum: Discourse on Sri Aurobindo’s ‘Life Divine’ by Subramany, Nithyatha, Auro Lab, Veerapanjan, 10 a.m.

Swami Tatwananda Ashram: Discourse on ‘Mandukya Upanishad’ by Swami Samananda, Swami Tatwananda Ashram, P and T Nagar, 6.45 p.m.

Sunday Communion Service: S. Joseph Wellington preaches, W. Prince Ernest leads, Jubilee Chapel, American College, 6 p.m.

Church of Christ: Sunday service, Deva Manickam delivers message, Visuvasapuri, Gnanaolivupuram, 10 a.m. and 6 p.m.

CULTURE

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes; 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women)

Prajapita Brahmakumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes; 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar; 40 Sambandamoorthy Street; 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Ulaga Samadhana Alayam: Sundaramoorthi Sachidananda conducts free meditation class, 138 Kamarajar Road, 7 p.m.

Madurai Philatelists and Numismatists’ Association: M. Swamyappan speaks on ‘Thailand coins, stamps and culture,’ Victoria Edward Hall, West Veli Street, 10 a.m.

Madurai Green: Tree walk, Natham Road, Parali, 2 p.m.

GENERAL

Confederation of Indian Industry: K. Veera Raghava Rao, Collector, flags off ‘Thodumun Kappom,’ awareness rally, Aravind Eye Hospital, 8 a.m.

Puratchi Kavignar Mandram: R. Ilankumaran speaks, P. Varadharajan presides, Maniyammai Nursery and Primary School, North Masi Street, 5 p.m.

Vidiyal: Training in drawing and painting, 6 AA Road, Rathinapuram, 10 a.m.

Meenakshi Mission Hospital: Continuous medical education programme and workshop on ‘Neuro emergency and critical care,’ S. Vadivelmurugan, Dean, Kanyakumari Medical College, speaks, Conference Hall, 8.30 a.m.

Madurai District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association: 30{+t}{+h}All India Ideal Home Exhibition, Tamukkam Ground, 11 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting; UC Higher Secondary School, 11 a.m.; RC School, Sivaganga Road, Melur, 6.30 p.m.; Justice V. R. Krishna Iyer Community Hall, Lake View Road, K. K. Nagar, and Railway Institute, 7 p.m.
title: Madurai Today
